description: Boost engagement and sales with Feedeo's interactive video powered by AI avatars.
title: Feedeo - AI Interactive Video Generator
introduction: Feedeo is a platform that allows users to create and publish interactive videos in five easy steps. It aims to enhance user engagement and feedback collection through AI-generated videos featuring digital avatars.
features: Embed clickable video intros starring AI avatars
Rapidly collect user data and feedback via integrated interactive videos
Get real-time data on your most engaging content
Drive visitors straight to your top links
Share videos by link to email, SMS, social medias
Customizable AI avatar by uploading photo
Share videos on site through iframe and bubble widget
Customizable AI avatar through video of a real person
targetPeople: Businesses, marketers, educators, recruiters, and e-commerce platforms looking to enhance engagement and feedback through interactive videos.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, there is a 14-day free trial available.

faqs.question: What is included in the free plan?
faqs.answer: The free plan includes 50 responses/month, 3 publishes lifetime, 3 video steps/project, interactive video editor, 6 pre-set AI avatar options, 10+ templates, share videos by link to email, SMS, social medias, and responses history.

faqs.question: What are the features of the Starter plan?
faqs.answer: The Starter plan includes 500 responses/month, 5 publishes/month, 10 video steps/project, all free features, customizable AI avatar by uploading photo, advanced components, and share videos on site through iframe and bubble widget.

faqs.question: What are the features of the Contact Us plan?
faqs.answer: The Contact Us plan includes 5,000 responses/month, 20 publishes/month, unlimited steps, all Starter features, customizable AI avatar through video of a real person, remove Feedeo logo, custom domain, and custom meta data tags.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from using Feedeo?
faqs.answer: Businesses, marketers, educators, recruiters, and e-commerce platforms looking to enhance engagement and feedback through interactive videos can benefit from using Feedeo.
